channel.title: An Early Program Proof by Alan Turing on Why The Platypus Codes
channel.description: Recent content in An Early Program Proof by Alan Turing on Why The Platypus Codes

item.title: Reachable States
item.description: In order to assist the checker, the programmer should make assertions about the various states that the machine can reach.

item.title: Definite Assertions
item.description: the programmer should make a number of definite assertions which can be checked individually, and from which the correctness of the whole programme easily follows.
